main event: A family and neighbor observed a round, disc-shaped object hovering and moving at high speed in the Bronx on June 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object hovered in the direction of Lagardner Airport and zoomed toward downtown Manhattan at a terrific speed,Several witnesses included a husband, two children, and a neighbor,The object was described as thick, silver-gray, and about the size of a target range,The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes,There was no photographic evidence included in the report.
